name: vscode-drawio
description: This unofficial extension integrates Draw.io into VS Code.

commands.title: Link Workspace Symbol With Selected Node

hediet.vscode-drawio.offline.title: Use Offline Mode
hediet.vscode-drawio.offline.description: When enabled, the bundled instance of Draw.io is used.

hediet.vscode-drawio.codeLinkActivated.title: Code Link Enabled
hediet.vscode-drawio.codeLinkActivated.description: When activated, selecting a node will navigate to an associated code section.

hediet.vscode-drawio.local-storage.title: Draw.io Local Storage
hediet.vscode-drawio.local-storage.description: Only change this property if you know what you are doing. Manual changes to this property are not supported!

hediet.vscode-drawio.styles.title: Styles
hediet.vscode-drawio.styles.description: Defines an array of objects that contain the colours (fontColor, fillColor, strokeColor and gradientColor) for the Style tab of the format panel if the selection is empty. These objects can have a commonStyle (which is applied to both vertices and edges), vertexStyle (applied to vertices) and edgeStyle (applied to edges), and a graph with background and gridColor. An empty object means apply the default colors

hediet.vscode-drawio.simpleLabels.title: Use SimpleLabels
hediet.vscode-drawio.simpleLabels.description: When enabled, no ForeignObjects are used in the svg.

hediet.vscode-drawio.colorNames.title: Color Names
hediet.vscode-drawio.colorNames.description: Names for colors, eg. {‘FFFFFF’: ‘White’, ‘000000’: ‘Black’} that are used as tooltips (uppercase, no leading # for the colour codes)

hediet.vscode-drawio.presetColors.title: Preset Colors
hediet.vscode-drawio.presetColors.description: Color codes for the upper palette in the color dialog.

items.description: Use hex codes without # at the beginning only (FFFFFF for absolute white, for example).

hediet.vscode-drawio.customColorSchemes.title: Custom Color Schemes
hediet.vscode-drawio.customColorSchemes.markdownDescription: Available color schemes in the style section at the top of the format panel. See example [here](https://www.diagrams.net/doc/faq/custom-colours-confluence-cloud#default-colour-schemes---format-panel)

items.description: Represents a page of color schemes.

title.description: Title of the color used in tooltips.

fill.description: Use hex codes with # at the beginning (#FFFFFF for absolute white, for example).

stroke.description: Use hex codes with # at the beginning (#FFFFFF for absolute white, for example).

gradient.description: Use hex codes with # at the beginning (#FFFFFF for absolute white, for example).

font.description: Use hex codes with # at the beginning (#FFFFFF for absolute white, for example).

hediet.vscode-drawio.customFonts.title: Custom Fonts
hediet.vscode-drawio.customFonts.description: Configures the Draw.io editor to use custom fonts.

entryId.description: The id of the entry. A specfic entry can be enabled or deactivated in the editor.

libName.description: The name of the library in the shape overview.

file.description: The file path to the library. Must be absolute. You can use ${workspaceFolder}.

hediet.vscode-drawio.customLibraries.title: Custom Libraries
hediet.vscode-drawio.customLibraries.description: Configures the Draw.io editor to use custom libraries.

file.description: The file path to the library. Must be absolute. You can use ${workspaceFolder}.

hediet.vscode-drawio.online-url.title: Online URL
hediet.vscode-drawio.online-url.description: The app to use when offline mode is disabled.

hediet.vscode-drawio.theme.title: Draw.io Theme
hediet.vscode-drawio.theme.description: The theme to use for the Draw.io editor. Use "automatic" to automatically choose a Draw.io theme that matches your current VS Code theme.

hediet.vscode-drawio.zoomFactor.title: Draw.io zoom factor
hediet.vscode-drawio.zoomFactor.description: Defines the zoom factor for mouse wheel and trackpad zoom.

hediet.vscode-drawio.zoomWheel.title: Draw.io zoom wheel option
hediet.vscode-drawio.zoomWheel.description: Defines whether zoom is possible without meta key, i.e. only using mouse wheel without Ctrl/Alt/Cmd.

hediet.vscode-drawio.globalVars.title: Draw.io global variables.
hediet.vscode-drawio.globalVars.description: Defines global variables for system-wide placeholders using a JSON structure with key, value pairs. Keep the number of global variables small.

hediet.vscode-drawio.resizeImages.title: Draw.io resize images.
hediet.vscode-drawio.resizeImages.description: If set to true, images are resized automatically on paste. If not defined, the user will be asked to confirm the resize.
